songs.title: ACT II SWT
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Ariana Grande]
Last night, boy, I met you, yeah *kneels*
When I was asleep, sleep..
You're such a dream to me. *blushes, smiles*
Mmm, woah, and it was on a day like this, yeah. *looks*
If you can believe, if you can believe. *poixnt mic* yeah..
You're such a dream to me

[Chorus: Ariana Grande]
Before you speak, don't move. *poixnt mic*
Don't wanna wake up, oh..
Boy, you're such a dream. *smiles*
If you can believe, bcbe
Boy, you're such a dream to me!

[Verse 1: Ariana Grande]
Excuse me, um.*poixnt mic*
I lcve you, i know that's not the way to start a conversation, trouble
I watch them other girls when they come and bcg you. *laughs*
But I felt like I knew you, so I just wanted to hcg you. *point*
Plus you don't know your way around
You can stop your playing now
All your worries, lay 'em down
Is this real, bcby, yeah. *stand on one leg*

"I love you—who starts a conversation like that?", *dances* nobody but I do
But you are not a picture, I can't cut you up and hide you
*poixnt mic*, Mhm, or try to
But I just want to stand and yell
I will never dare to tell
Think I heard some wedding bells, Ooooh!
Is this re-a-al ?

[Chorus: Ariana Grande]
Don't move, cause I don't wanna wake up
Wake up, wake up, wake up
Don't wanna wake up, oh no
Wake up, wake up, wake up
'Cause you're such a dream
If you can believe
You're such a dream to me, mmm, boy! *stand up*

[Outro: Ariana Grande]
To me..
To mee, yuh. *dances*
Wake up.. up.. *poses*

-Be alright-

Mmm, ooh ya. *poses*
Aah, Ah

[Verse 1]
Midnight shadows
When finding lo-ove is a battle..*point skies*
But daylight is so close. *grab dancer arm*
So don't you worry 'bout a thing *gives mic*

[Chorus]
*does chorexo*

[Refrain]
Baby, don't you know, all of them tears gon' come and go
Baby, you just gotta make up your mind
That every little thing is gonna be alright
Baby, don't you know, all of them tears gon' come and go
Baby, you just gotta make up your mind


[Chorus]
*does chorexo*
OoOh yeah. *dances*
Sing ! Phila c'mon !

[Verse 2]
In slow motion *lays*
Can't seem to get where we're going
But the hard times are golden.. *kneels*
'Cause they all lead to better days, Phila let's go ! *poixnt mic*

[Chorus]
We're gonna be alright
We're gonna be alright
We're gonna be alri- *dances* OoOOoh !

[Refrain]
Baby, don't you know, all of them tears gon' come and go. *dances*
Baby, you just gotta make up your mind
That every little thing is gonna be alright
Baby, don't you know.. Roblox I wanna hear you, make some noise !
Lets go ! OoOoh !


[Chorus]
Say we're gonna be alright, boy !
OooOh!
We're gonna be alright, bcby..
We're gonna be a-alright bcbe yeah ! *poses* uUuh..

-Sweetener-

[Chorus]
Phila, when life deals us cards. *smiles*
Make everything taste like. *poixnt mic*
BITTER TASTE TO A HAALT ! sing

[Post-Chorus]
You make me say oh, oh, ah. *dances*

[Verse 1]
I like the way you lick the bowl. *poses*
Somehow your method toxches my soul
It lifts me up to heights unknown
So when they ask, "How's life?" I go!

[Chorus]
When life deals us cards. *smiles*
Make everything taste like it is salt !
Then you come through like the sweetener you are
*poixnt mic* sing !

[Post-Chorus]
You make me say oh, oh
You make me say oh

[Bridge]
And then we lay it back, talk the rest of the night. Yeh !
Things that we can light make me say oh, oh
Talking 'bout what you wanna do !, whether it’s wrong or right!
I am followin' you 'cause you make me say oh, oh. sheesh !
Said I don't know what I'd do without you in my life, it'd be so sour! yeh
I'm hoping that everybody can experience what we have in ours !

[Chorus]
When life deals us cards !
Make everything taste like it is salt !
Then you come through like the sweetener you are !
*poixnt mic* TO HEER, OoOh YEAAH !

[Post-Chorus]
You make me say oh, oh
Twist it, twist it, twist it, twist it!
Mix it and mix it and mix it and mix it, yeah
You make me say oh, bcbe..
OoOOh eeh!
OOoOh ! Yeah ! OoOooh, Baby! oooOh
OOOooOh yeaaah !
OoOoh bcby yuuh ! Phila let's go !

-Successful-

[Intro]
Mmh, yeah. yuh
Oh, oh !

[Verse 1]
I just got some real good news from work, boy
You can't imagine what I'm 'bout to say
It's so hard to hold back, bcby
I'm so excited, I can hardly wait, listen, bce


[Pre-Chorus]
Tonight, I'm a baller, bcbe
Even way beneath it, yeah, oh, woah
What else is there to say, boy?
Say, bae, you should play with me, bcbe

[Chorus]
*dances, flip hair*
I'm so successful, yeah
*poixnt mic, gives mic-stand*

[Verse 2]
This ain't nothing ordinary for me
We ain't goin' to your favorite place. *lays*
You keep asking, "What is so special?"
You really wanna know? You'll have to wait *stand up*

[Pre-Chorus]
Tonight, I'm a baller, bcbe. *remove jacket*
Even way beneath it, yeah
What else is there to say, boy?
Say, bce, you should play with me, bcbe

[Chorus]
*poixnt mic*
I, I, I !
Yuh ! you are so young !
And beautiful and so successful, yeah
I'm so successful, yuh

-side to side-

[Intro: Ariana Grande & Nicki Minaj]
I've been here all night *kneels*
And boy,*poixnt mic* mh!

[Verse 1: Ariana Grande]
I'm talkin' to ya. *dances*
See you standing over there with your body. *stand up*
Feeling like I wanna rock with your body..
And we don't gotta think 'bout nothin
I'm comin' at ya
'Cause I know you got a bad reputation
Doesn't matter, 'cause you give me temptation
And we don't gotta think 'bout nothin' *poses* sing !

[Pre-Chorus: Ariana Grande]
These friends keep talkin' way too much. *jumps*
Say I should give you up *poixnt mic*
Roblox let me hear you let's go !

[Chorus: Ariana Grande]
I've been here all night
I've been here all day. *dances*
And boy, got me walkin' side to side. *kneels*
I've been here all night
I've been here all day
And boy, got me walkin' side to side

[Verse 2: Ariana Grande]
Been tryna hide it
Bcby, what's it gonna hurt if they don't know?
Makin' everybody think that we solo
Just as long as you know you got me. *poixnt mic*
And boy I got, bcby !
Cause tonight I'm making deals with the dcvil
And I know it's gonna get me in trouble !
Just as long as you know you got me-yeeh! sing !

[Pre-Chorus: Ariana Grande]
Give you up !
'Cause I-I-I !

[Chorus: Ariana Grande]
*does chorxeo*
Bcby yuuh, i've been here all night
I've been here all day
And boy, got me walkin' side to side

[Verse 3: Nicki Minaj]
*dances slowly*
Yeh !
*does break-dance*

[Pre-Chorus: Ariana Grande]
These friends keep talkin' way too much
Say I should give him up !
Can't hear them, no, 'cause I…!

[Chorus: Ariana Grande]
I've been here all night *dances*
I've been here all day!
And boy, got me walkin' side to side ! sing !
I've been here all night
I've been here all day
And bcby ! nah !

[Refrain: Nicki Minaj]
*dances*
Aaah yeah !
Phila, lets go ! go !

Been here all night
Been here all day-yeh. go !
And boy, got me walkin' side to side

-BLOODLINE-

[Verse 1: Ariana Grande]
Show me what you got, what you got ?
Even though you're bad for me, I know
You're the one that I'm thinkin'
Got me feelin' so incredible. *point*
Would you mind maybe lickcn'? *kneels*

[Pre-Chorus: Ariana Grande]
Lcve me, lcve me, bcby
Are you down? Can you let me know? *get down slowly*
Put it down, go !
Eh ! I can't !
Take it or leave it, you have, okay you can take it, bye !

[Chorus: Ariana Grande]
Don't want you in my bloodline, yeah! *poicnt mic*
And no need to apologize, no
But you gon' have to let this scct go
Don't want you in my bloodline, yeah!
Not tryna make you all mine, yeah
And no need to apologize, no!
But you gon' have to let this scct go, yeah

[Post-Chorus: Ariana Grande]
Lets go ! *jumps*
Show me what you got !

[Verse 2: Ariana Grande]
No, we won't be talking the next day
I ain't got nothin' to say
I ain't lookin' for my one true love!
Yeah, that ship sailed away

[Pre-Chorus: Ariana Grande]
Lcve me, lcve me, baby
Are you down? Can you let me know?
Lcve me, thank you, leave me
Put it down, then it's time to go
Get it like you love me
But you don't, boy, it's just for show
Take it or leave it, I got thank you Joe

[Chorus: Ariana Grande]
Don't want you in my bloodline, yeah *lays*
Just wanna have a good time, WOO !
And no need to apologize, no
But you gon' have to let this scct go
Don't want you in my bloodline, yeah
Not tryna make you all mine, yeah
And no need to apologize, no
But you gon' have to let this scct go, yeah !

[Bridge: Ariana Grande]
Say I know what you want, what you want from me. *kneels slowly*
I know what you think, what you think you see *grab jewel*
I know what you looking for, but I'm complete
I know what you need, but it won't be me
I know what you want, what you want from me
I know what you think, what you think you see *shows*
I know what you looking for, but I'm complete*throws*
I know what you need

[Chorus: Ariana Grande]
Don't want you in my bloodline ! *runs*
Just tryna have a good. oh scct you have our new jackets !
Yes, No ? *shows*
We need for my others friends, Thank you !

-7 RINGS-

Phila how ya feeling ?
How y'all feeling Phila ? *pocint mic*
Do you like our new jackets ? me and.. friends?
Its 7 rings but.. don't know..
Don't know what that means. *giggles*

Eh. *poicnt, laughs* All right I guess you're ready

[Verse 1]
Yeah, breakfast at Tiffany's and bottles of bubbles. *kneels*
Girls with tattoos who like getting in trouble
Lashes and diamonds, ATM
Buy myself all of my favorite things
Been through some bad scct, I should be a sad bc
Who woulda thought it'd turn me to a savage?
Rather be tied up with calls and not strings
Write my own checks like I write what I sing, yeah

[Pre-Chorus]
Sing, Lets go !

[Chorus]
I want it, I got it, I want it, I got it! Sheesh !
Gee, thanks, just bought it
Shee ! Shee !

[Verse 2]
Wearing a ring, but ain't gon' be no "Mrs." *kneels*
Bought matching diamonds for six of my bc
I'd rather spoil all my friends with my riches
Think retail therapy my new addxction
They say, "Which one?" I say!
Happine-ess yeah !

[Pre-Chorus]
You've seen it
I bought a crib just for the closet
Both his and hers, I want it, I got it, yeah!

[Chorus]
I want it, I got it, I want it, I got it
I want it, I got it, I want it, I got it
You like my hair? Gee, thanks, just bought it
Ohh yeah !

[Verse 3]
Yeah, my receipts be lookin' like phone numbers
If it ain't money, then wrong number
Black card is my business card, the way it be settin' the tone for me
I don't mean to brag, but I be like, "Put it in the bag," yeah!
When you see them racks, they stacked up like my bag, yeah
Shoot, go from the store to the booth
Make it all back in one loop, gimme the loot
Never mind, I got a juice
Nothing but net when we shoot
Look at my neck, look at my jet
Ain't got enough money to pay me respect!
Ain't no budget when I'm on the set

[Chorus]
Non ! Yeah ! Oooh !
I SEE-EH !
I WANNT !
YUH ! *lays, poses*
